column1: '''''The Wanderer''''' is a book containing a critical edition of the [[Old English]] [[Wikipedia:The Wanderer (poem)
column2: poem ''The Wanderer'']], edited by two of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s former students: [[T.P. Dunning]] and [[A.J. Bliss]]. In their Introduction, the editors provide a reference to Tolkien's essay "[[Ofermod]]" (cf. page 94, footnote 3).
